title: Rich potato and bacon soup
ingredients: ['6 medium potatoes, peeled and diced', '150g butter', '85g flour', '1.6L milk', '225ml soured cream', '250g grated Cheddar cheese, or to taste', '6 to 8 rashers cooked bacon, crumbled', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 dash pepper', '1 teaspoon dried basil', 'a few coriander leaves, finely chopped']
